definition: one of several parts or pieces that fit with others to constitute a whole object, to divide or split up
details:
noun
- one of several parts or pieces that fit with others to constitute a whole object
= example: one of several parts or pieces that fit with others to constitute a whole object
= synonyms: section
- one of the parts into which something naturally divides
= example: one of the parts into which something naturally divides
verb
- to divide or split up
= example: to divide or split up
- to divide into segments
= example: to divide into segments
= synonyms: section
